content: Ingredients: 1 cup = 160 gms Wheat Flour - 1 cup Rice Flour - 1 cup Semolina - 1/3 cup ( Sooji/ Mumbai Rava ) Onion - finely chopped - 1/4 cup Grated carrot - 1/4 cup Coriander leaves - chopped - 1/4 cup Mustard seeds - 1/2 tsp Cumin seeds - 1/2 tsp Curry leaves - 4 to 5 Green chillies - 2 - finely chopped Salt - As per taste Oil - As required to apply on dosa Procedure: -- Take a bowl then add all ingredients ( except oil ) -- Mix well -- Mix it properly by adding water with out any lumps in the batter -- Batter should be in pouring consistency -- Dosa Tava should be on medium heat -- Once check the tawa is hot or not by sprinkling water on it -- Now add batter on tava -- Apply oil -- Â cook both sides till golden brown color -- Serve with coconut chutneyÂ Coriander Coconut Chutney / Kothimeera Kobbari Chutney Step by step process shown below with pictures:   [caption id="attachment_5381" align="alignnone" width="2448"] Rava Dosa[/caption] Follow us: Facebook Instagram Twitter Google+ Share your comments in below section, I like to know your feedback Â© 2017- 2018 Ramyarecipes
